snippet.title: Eye Can See You - Game Teaser
snippet.description:
"Eye Can See You" is a mystery horror otome game about Aiya Yoshida, a girl who possesses an ancestral magic eye that allows her to see spirits.

She enters a new school and encounters spirits, who haunt their school on a daily basis. Each one with their own story regarding their life and death.

But soon she discovers that not all of them have good intentions...

Play now: https://gongonstudio.itch.io/eye-can-see-you

Follow on our social media to stay updated!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GongonStudio
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/gongonstudio

Credits:
Music: TAM Music Factory (https://www.tam-music.com/)
© Gongon Studio. All Rights Reserved.
